get.description: Requires a valid JWT in query params called token

401.description: Returns message saying token has expired due to invalid JWT token

post.description: Expects username and password in request body e.g., {username: 'Hamilton', password:'pass123'}

400.description: Returns invalid credentials when wrong credentials provided

post.description: Expects username and password in request body e.g., {username: 'Hamilton', password:'pass123'}

400.description: Return user already exists when user already exists in the system
